hooks.command: filepath="$CLAUDE_FILE_PATH"; if echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.ts$|\.vue$'; then cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/frontend" && npx tsc --noEmit 2>&1 | head -30; elif echo "$filepath" | grep -qE '\.py$'; then cd "$(git rev-parse --show-toplevel)/backend" && uv run python -m py_compile "$filepath" 2>&1; fi
